Text:
Dear bbs,
I want to thank you for all the good books you have available to us.
I am writing this short note to ask you if you can get the following books:

@banga1980

I will check to see if i have these books on hand.

If i have them i will upload them,if i don't i will check my sources and do my best to find them or something as close as possible such as an earlier or later edition.This will take time as i have to sort through thousands of books so,be patient.If i get them you will get them :)

Check back
thanks. I look forward to have of these books. thank you again
